73ae8bcf2fb31890e0f497eef699b6e1 30 Once per game session during a combat encounter, the character may spend two destiny points to make a Hard (3 difficulty dice) Resilience check.  If he succeeds, he skips his next turn and eliminates all enemy minions in the encounter.  (The minions are all eliminated immediately, so they do not get to participate further in the combat, but for the sake of the narrative, the PC can spend the next round of combat incapacitating them).  The narrative means by which he accomplishes this is up to the PC, but should be suitably exciting.  It must also be approved by the GM.
